titleStmt.title: A loving salutation with several seasonable exhortations contained in two general epistles sent unto all the saints and persecuted people of God in the houshold [sic] of faith to be red [sic] among them before they be banished as bond-men and bond-women out of the land of their nativity for their religion and righteousness sake.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.
Salthouse, Thomas, 1630-1691.

notesStmt.note: The first epistle is signed: "R.F." [Richard Farnworth] and the second "Thomas Salthouse".
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
